summary: Jaguar Racing was a Formula One team which raced from 2000 to 2004. It comes from Stewart Grand Prix.
full_text: John Paul "Johnny" Herbert  is a British racing driver. He competed in Formula One, winning three races, and also in sports cars winning the Le Mans 24 Hours in 1991 driving a Mazda 787B. He enjoyed much success in lower-level motor racing and raced in Formula One for several teams.
title: Johnny Herbert
